heading: Such a pleasure to watch.
review: This is movie will simply steal your heat!! What else can I say,,, just superb!! Not just for Shah Rukh Khan's fans, but for everyone this is a must watch.I will give all the credits to the director for making a movie like this.. a movie that carries a lot of thought for love and emotion as well as passion. The first half of the movie was a little slow, but the second half is just amazing!! It will blow you out completely!! SRK's 20 second appearance will making you go crazy for him... gosh he's so damn cool! Anyway, you cant miss this movie, simple cant!! Give it a watch.
